name: Tomatoes (Thalfis)
description:
Hey stranger, you're looking for an adventure?

You want some epic loot and monster?

Well, I probably have some golden shiny things and cruel beasts for you.

But... are you sure that you'll be strong enough?

... I guess you are!

But I have to warn you! You shouldn't be afraid of all the bugs and weird things which are lurking in the shadows!

I wish you good luck and lots of golden shiny things.

(Control: WASD, space for jump and leftmouse for attack).

(To leave the GameOver- and YouWin-screen you can use escape and enter).

This game was made for an intake assignment for Saxion university.

It's the first game I ever made. I learned some basic things about Unity and C# on the way.
